rooms.description: A spacious entryway that leads to a living area, with built-in storage and seating. Adheres to Vastu by facing the North-East direction.
Large open-plan space adjoining the kitchen. Features ample natural light from large windows on the East side following Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room with modern appliances and storage. Designed in an open plan for connectivity and ventilation, placed in the South-West as per Vastu.
Integrated into the living space with flexible seating arrangement, enhancing interaction while observing spatial harmony.
A dedicated quiet zone featuring built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating. Ideally located in a calm corner following Vastu, away from noise.
Spacious bedroom with an attached bathroom and walk-in closet. Positioned towards the North for positivity according to Vastu guidelines.
Generous space suitable for family members, includes built-in wardrobes. Placed on the West side as per Vastu norms.
Functional bedroom with ample storage; positioned towards the South ensuring good energy flow.
Additional bedroom designed for guests or children, located in a quiet corner of the ground floor.
Shared bathroom on the ground floor with efficient plumbing and privacy screens. Positioned to maintain balance as per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance door placed facing the North-East for auspicious entry.
Large window to enhance natural light and energy flow in living spaces.
Exit door designed for emergency egress, positioned according to Vastu guidelines.
